::Zardus/Ramulus::

Ramulus walks forward toward the Ark as he shoots at Shuko. A shadow passes 
over him as Zardus walks up behind him. Ramulus spins around, looking up at 
the Alliance leader.

"Your fellow maximals are not following the treaty, maximal," Zardus says, 
pointing to the battle between Dark One, Hiss, and the Maximals.

Ramulus looks at where Zardus was pointing. He nods, "Let's go resolve it."

The two bots walk up to the scirmish.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator opens his optics, looking as Zardus and Ramulus make their way to 
Dark One, Hiss, and the maximals. He takes out a rifle, aiming it carefully.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Maximals, stand down," Ramulus says at the same time Zardus orders the 
Alliance troops to hold their fire, "We are allied with the Alliance."

A shot from Annihilator sends Ramulus flying forward, a sparking hole in his 
back. Reacting instantly, Zardus turns, opening fire with his automatic on 
Annihilator.

Screaming as many shots dig into his chest, Annihilator flies backwards into 
a boulder, going unconscious.

Zardus holds his finger on the trigges even after Annihilator faints, 
riddling the newcomer's body with holes.

"I weev thelf, juko." Annihilator says into his comm-link, mech fluid flowing 
from his mouth as his systems go into stasis lock.

Zardus turns back to the group, still holding his gun dangeroustly.

"Now," he says as Ramulus stands up, using the wall of the Ark for support, 
"We are trying to help you fight off these newcomers. It would be apreciated 
if you wouldn't fire on us."
